mysite
Table of Contents

Namespace CodeAnalysisService.GraphService.EdgeBuilder

Classes

ClassEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for ClassNodes, including inheritance, implemented interfaces, fields, properties, methods, and constructors.

ConstructorEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for ConstructorNodes:

  • Structural: adds a HasConstructor edge from the declaring class to the constructor.
  • Behavioral: analyzes object creation expressions inside the constructor body and adds Creates edges to the constructed ClassNodes.
EventEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for EventNodes, linking them to their declaring class and to any delegate type they reference. Produces HasEvent, RaisesEvent, and Uses edges where applicable.

FieldEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for FieldNodes, linking their declared type and any element type (e.g., array or generic element) to the corresponding ClassNode. Produces Uses and HasFieldElement edges.

InterfaceEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for InterfaceNodes, capturing inheritance relationships between interfaces (i.e., when an interface extends one or more base interfaces).

MethodEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for MethodNodes, including return type, parameter usage, calls, overrides, object creation, field/property references, and interface implementations.

PropertyEdgeBuilder

Builds edges for PropertyNodes, including references to fields, usage of class types, and element-type relationships (e.g., arrays, generics). Produces ReferencesField, Uses, and HasPropertyElement edges.

Interfaces

IEdgeBuilder

Defines a contract for building edges in the graph for a specific NodeType. Each implementation inspects a given INode and produces outgoing EdgeNode connections based on Roslyn symbols and syntax.
